archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Prepare tech data
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Just a part of the H/C data, the part that is visible by the customer. This will be based on * all the existing 3D design office data (Airbus or suppliers) which will be downsized for S&M or S&S usage (for tablet usage and for security reasons). We need on this topic the full integration between 3DExperience and 3DExcite * scan of parts * redesign in 3D from 2D for strategic parts * etcâ€¦
